15676.en:
<start_lip_sync n00121 _normal m00001>Ever since he returned home after being injured, the
Village King's fever has not gone down, and just now he
finally lost consciousness...<stop_lip_animation n00121 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15676.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00121 _normal m00001>「ケガを負って　帰って以来
　ずっと　村王の熱が下がらなかったのだが
　さきほど　ついに　意識を失ってしまった……。<stop_lip_animation n00121 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15676.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00121 _normal m00001>: 부상을 입고 돌아오신 뒤로
　촌왕님의 열이 내려가질 않았는데
　조금 전에 기어이 의식을 잃고 마셨다…….<stop_lip_animation n00121 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15676.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00121 _normal m00001>村王负伤回来以后，
一直高烧不退，
刚才还失去了意识……<stop_lip_animation n00121 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15676.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00121 _normal m00001>村王負傷回來後
就一直高燒不退，

15677.en:
<start_lip_sync n00121 _normal m00001>At-at this rate, the Village King's life is in danger!
We must hurry and prepare an antipyretic!<stop_lip_animation n00121 CLOSE_MOUTH>

<start_lip_sync n00121 _normal m00001>「こ　このままでは　村王の　命が危ない！

15677.zh-Hans:

必须赶快准备退烧药！<stop_lip_animation n00121 CLOSE_MOUTH>

15679.en:
<start_lip_sync n00121 _normal m00001>Thank goodness! You don't need to do anything
extraordinary to get both of them either! If you have
an Alchemy Pot, then you can try making them with it.<stop_lip_animation n00121 CLOSE_MOUTH>

<start_lip_sync n00121 _normal m00001>「ありがたい！　どちらも　特別なことをせずとも

　それで　作ってみるのもよいだろう。<stop_lip_animation n00121 CLOSE_MOUTH>

<start_lip_sync n00121 _normal m00001>: 고맙다! 둘 다 특별한 노력 없이도

　있다면 그걸로 만드는 것도 괜찮을 테지.<stop_lip_animation n00121 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15679.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00121 _normal m00001>谢谢！这两样材料都不用花多大功夫就能到手！
